description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. DEM.S-Blue Partisan- is vertical scrolling shooter game. The world is reviving from the apocalypse war. But mankind repeat the same mistake. You become cyborg Soldier "Dem.B" and fight it out.
